schools.name: O. J. Actis Junior High School

data.description: Classic Wattenbarger build in the Southwest. Entry to formal living room, galley kitchen and large family room with breakfast nook. Vast backyard with covered patio and ideal East/West exposure. May be room for an R.V. Recent paint and new appliances. Centrally located to schools and shopping.
